info.description: This is a swagger documentation for Datasource Plugin APIs
info.title: Data Protection Platform - Datasource Plugin API

post.description: Start the Backup operation

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request body for operation

parameters.name: operation-Id
parameters.description: Unique id of the LRO

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: This is the version of the Plugin API

parameters.name: subscription-id
parameters.description: SubscriptionId of the resource

parameters.name: resource-id
parameters.description: unique id of the resource

parameters.name: task-id
parameters.description: unique id of the current task

parameters.name: x-ms-client-request-id
parameters.description: correlation request Id for tracking a particular call.

202.description: Accepted. If completion of LRO is synchronous, the Response.Status = Succeeded | Failed | Canceled

Retry-After.description: Polling interval in seconds to get the next status of the LRO.

x-ms-error-code.description: ErrorCode string in the event of a failure.

x-ms-request-id.description: request Id for tracking a particular call.

default.description: Error Scenario, where Plugin cannot send Kind specific Error in LRO response

x-ms-error-code.description: ErrorCode string in the event of a failure.

x-ms-request-id.description: Request Id for tracking a particular request.

AdhocBasedTaggingCriteria.description: Class for Adhoc backup Tagging Criteria

taggingCriteria.description: Tagging Criteria containing retention tag for adhoc backup.

AzureBackupParamsForPlugin.description: Backup Parameters that need to be sent for plugin

retentionTag.description: Retention tag that the backup must be marked with

policyInfo.description: Policy Info that is required while creating the pit by plugin

policyParameters.description: BackupInstance policy-parameters containing DataStore parameters etc.

resourceGroupId.description: Gets or sets the Resource Group Uri.

BackupCriteria.description: Identifies the type of backup and trigger

objectType.description: Type of the specific object - used for deserializing
Type of the specific object - used for deserializing

BackupParameters.description: Base class for parameters specific to Backup agent

objectType.description: Type of the specific object - used for deserializing

loopBackContext.description: LoopbackContext returned from previous plugin calls, to be sent again.

BackupRequestBase.description: BackupRequestBase is the base for all backup request.

rPCatalogInitializeParams.description: The dictionary required to initialize the RPCatalog client library.

datastoreInitializeParams.description: The dictionary required to initialize the Datastore client library.

backupParameters.description: List of properties with values that the Backup should honour, for a given BackupRule. Like Tags, Exclusion rules etc.

BackupRule.description: Rule definition based on which backup is triggered

backupParameters.description: it will have parameters that should be used by BA i.e backup type like Full, Incremental, Logs

trigger.description: Defines trigger; schedule based or adhoc

name.description: Unique name of the entity/object (sometimes this is friendly as well)

timeZone.description: TimeZone input as string. For example: TimeZone = "Pacific Standard Time".

BackupSettings.description: Settings and rules required to take scheduled/adhoc backups

dataSourceType.description: Type of datasource for the backup management

rawJsonSetting.description: this is optional raw json opaque setting for the datasource where mgmt does not understand the backup policy/setting.

policyName.description: Name of the policy used for this backup instance

policyParameters.description: Policy parameters for the backup instance

objectType.description: Type of Datasource object, used to initialize the right inherited type

BaseRequest.description: Base request for all plugin operations

jobLibraryInitializationParams.description: The initialization params of the Job Client Lib. The plugin needs this to do progress updates on Jobs.

datasourceAccessToken.description: Access token for the Datasource Mgmt and Data plane. This is an MSI token (in almost all cases)

objectType.description: Type of the specific object - used for deserializing

VmwareVMProperties.description: Properties which are specific to vmwares

additionalProperties.description: Any additional properties that should be returned along with this operation

telemetryData.description: Additional Json Serialized Telemetry data from the Plugin. This would be logged with BA Telemetry.

retryAfterOnRetryableErrorInSeconds.description: If Plugin terminates with a retryable ErrorCode, it can set this value in Seconds for BA to retry after this.

containersList.description: List of containers to be protected

datasourceAccessToken.description: Access token for the Datasource Mgmt and Data plane. This is an MSI token (in almost all cases)

loopBackContext.description: LoopbackContext returned from previous plugin calls, to be sent again.

dataTransferredInBytes.description: Size of data transferred as part of backup

loopBackContext.description: LoopbackContext returned from previous plugin calls, to be sent again.

originalDatasourceSizeInBytes.description: Size of original datasource when the backup was created

dataTransferredInBytes.description: Size of data transferred as part of backup

Datasource.description: Base datasource class with properties common to all fabric types

resourceID.description: Full ARM ID of the resource. For azure resources, this is ARM ID. For non azure resources, this will be the ID created by backup service via Fabric/Vault.

baseUri.description: BaseUri of the resource. For azure resources, this will be ARM endpoint of current cloud. For non azure resources, this will be private endpoint information or null.

resourceName.description: Unique identifier of the resource in the context of parent.

objectType.description: Type of Datasource object, used to initialize the right inherited type

DatasourceSet.description: DatasourceSet class with properties common to all fabric types

resourceID.description: Full ARM ID of the resource. For azure resources, this is ARM ID. For non azure resources, this will be the ID created by backup service via Fabric/Vault.

baseUri.description: BaseUri of the resource. For azure resources, this will be ARM endpoint of current cloud. For non azure resources, this will be private endpoint information or null.

resourceName.description: Unique identifier of the resource in the context of parent.

objectType.description: Type of Datasource object, used to initialize the right inherited type

DatasourceTokens.description: Tokens to be sent by Backup Agent to plugin host

dataPlaneToken.description: Token associated with accessing the data plane of datasource.

mgmtPlaneToken.description: Access token for the Datasource  management plane. This is an MSI token (in almost all cases)

dataPlanePrincipalId.description: PrincipalId of the identity which is providing DataPlaneToken.

mgmtPlanePrincipalId.description: PrincipalId of the identity which is providing DataPlaneToken. Typically Vault MSI PrincipalId.

dataPlaneTokenType.description: Gets or sets the type of DataPlaneToken. One of values defined in enum DataPlaneTokenType.

storageTypeFlags.description: Type of storage to be used for storing backup data. Passed as input to datastore.

authorizationTypeFlags.description: Type of storage to be used for storing backup data. Passed as input to datastore.

objectType.description: Type of Datasource object, used to initialize the right inherited type
Type of the specific object - used for deserializing

isLast.description: Whether Date is last date of month

Error.description: Error object used by layers that dont use any localized content.

properties.description: Any key value pairs that can be injected inside error object

additionalProperties.description: Any Key Value pairs that can be injected inside the error object

isUserError.description: boolean flag to suggest if this errorcode is user created or not.

isRetryable.description: indication of whether this error can be retried or not.

additionalInfo.description: Any Key value pairs that can be provided to the client for additional  verbose information.

embeddedInnerError.description: Child Inner Error, to allow Nesting.

ItemLevelRestoreCriteria.description: Class to contain criteria for item level restore

objectType.description: Type of the specific object - used for deserializing

ItemPathBasedRestoreCriteria.description: Class to contain criteria for item path based restore

itemPath.description: Path of the item to be restored

isPathRelativeToBackupItem.description: Flag to specify if the path is relative to Backup Item or full path

dataTransferredInBytes.description: Size of data transferred as part of backup or Restore in bytes.

totalDataInBytes.description: Total data to be transferred as part of backup or Restore in bytes.

timeRemainingInMinutes.description: Estimated time remaining to complete the data transfer in minutes.

percentComplete.description: If total data and data transferred is known, Plugins to send the percentage complete also.

KubernetesPVRestoreCriteria.description: Class used for Kubernetes PV Restore Criteria

KubernetesStorageClassRestoreCriteria.description: Class used for Kubernetes Storage Class Restore Criteria

policyName.description: Name of the policy that pit should be tagged with

policyVersion.description: Version of policy that pit should be tagged with

dataStoreParametersList.description: Gets or sets the DataStore Parameters

backupDatasourceParametersList.description: Gets or sets the Backup Parameters

ProtectionRequestBase.description: Base request for Validate, Start and Stop protection

backupSettings.description: Full backup settings used to protect the datasource

RangeBasedItemLevelRestoreCriteria.description: Item Level target info for restore operation

minMatchingValue.description: minimum value for range prefix match

maxMatchingValue.description: maximum value for range prefix match

datasourceAccessToken.description: Access token for the Datasource Mgmt and Data plane. This is an MSI token (in almost all cases)

Response.description: Response body received from the Plugin Server.

id.description: As passed in the URL?s operationId query parameter

status.description: Service-set extensible enum indicating operation?s kind

loopBackContext.description: LoopbackContext returned from previous plugin calls, to be sent again.

RestoreRequestBase.description: RestoreRequestBase is the base for RestoreRequest

restoreAsFilesTargetDetails.description: Destination of RestoreAsFiles operation, when destination is not a datasource

restoreToRPId.description: RPId to be used for restore.

restoreToPointInTime.description: PointInTime to be used for restore.

rPCatalogInitializeParams.description: The dictionary required to initialize the RPCatalog client library. We need to GET RPs of the src.

datastoreInitializeParams.description: The dictionary required to initialize the Datastore client library. We need to GET Backup content of the source.

tagName.description: Retention Tag Name to relate it to retention rule.

ScheduleBasedBackupCriteria.description:
This is for scheduled backups where criteria is schedule based
                 /// Example of supported identifiers:
             1.  Every Sunday/Monday
                 DaysOfWeeks : Sunday/Monday
            
             2.  First/Second Sunday/Tuesday of the Month
                 WeekOfMonth : First/Second
                 DaysOfWeek : Sunday/Tuesday
            
             3.  1st/2nd day of month
                 DaysOfMonth : 1/2
            
             4. First Sunday of January
                 WeekOfMonth : First/Second
                 DaysOfWeek : Sunday/Tuesday
                 MonthsOfYear : Jan
            
             5. 1st/2nd January
                 DaysOfMonth : 1/2
                 MonthsOfYear : Jan
            
             6. First SuccessFull of Week
                AbsoluteIdentifier : FirstOfWeek

absoluteCriteria.description:
it contains absolute values like "AllBackup" / "FirstOfDay" / "FirstOfWeek" / "FirstOfMonth"
            and should be part of AbsoluteMarker enum

scheduleTimes.description: List of schedule times for backup

daysOfMonth.description: This is day of the month from 1 to 28 other wise last of month

ScheduleBasedTriggerContext.description: Specific class for schedule based triggers

taggingCriteria.description: List of tags that can be applicable for given schedule.

criteria.description: Criteria which decides whether the tag can be applied to a triggered backup.

TargetDetails.description: Class encapsulating target details, used where the destination is not a datasource

url.description: Url denoting the restore destination. It can point to container / file share etc

filePrefix.description:
Restore operation may create multiple files inside location pointed by Url
            Below will be the common prefix for all of them

restoreTargetLocationType.description:
Denotes the target location where the data will be restored,
            string value for the enum {Microsoft.Internal.AzureBackup.DataProtection.Common.Interface.RestoreTargetLocationType}

TriggerContext.description: Contains the context of a backup trigger - whether it is event based, ad-hoc, etc.

objectType.description: Type of the specific object - used for deserializing

UpdateProtectionStatus.description: UpdateProtectionStatus for the Update Protection operation.

ValidateForBackupRequest.description: ValidateForBackupRequest for the validate for backup operation.

ValidateForBackupStatus.description: ValidateForBackupStatus for the validate for backup operation.

ValidateForProtectionRequest.description: ValidateForProtectionRequest for the validate for protection operation.

ValidateForRestoreRequest.description: Validates the restore request on the plugin.

isValidateOnlyOperation.description: This is set to true, if the request is not part of actual Restore operation, Else this is set to false/Null

ValidateForRestoreStatus.description: Plugin's Status for validate for restore request
